title: What A Girl Wants
description: Unemployed after being fired from her last job, Hayley Jane Smith finds herself falling for the handsome detective investigating a murder in which she has become a suspect, as her three best friends--Diane, Audra, and Suz--come to her aid with a host of not-so-wonderful advice about life, love, and pursuing one's goals. A first novel. Original. 50,000 first printing.
author: Liz Maverick
